Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class MainBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.MainBoard
public class MainBoard extends Object
MainBoard class used to model everything shared between players

    • MainBoard

      public MainBoard(StudentsBag gameStudentsBag)
      Constructor method: it creates Islands array, it places the mother nature on a random island, and it places on the other islands one student with pickRandomStudent method, except the island in front of the mother nature
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • pickStartPlaceMotherNature

      public static int pickStartPlaceMotherNature()
      Static method to make a random int
      Returns:
      a random integer from 0 to initial number of islands - 1

    • calculateInfluence

      public int calculateInfluence(Player[] professors, Vector<Team> teams, Island island, Player currentPlayer)
      Method to calculate the team with the greatest influence It creates an array that represents the influence of each team of the passed island For each color it calculates the influences of the team Add extra influences points for the towers Return the index of the team with the greatest influence
      Parameters:
      professors - array representing the players that control the respective professors
      teams - vector of the teams
      island - island on which to calculate the influence
      Returns:
      the integer that represents the team, if it is equal to -1 it is not possible to conquer or control the island, because two or more team have the same influence

    • addToIsland

      public void addToIsland(int color, int numIslandId)
      addToIsland: method to add a student on an island
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student
      numIslandId - the id of island to place the student

    • joinIsland

      public void joinIsland(int numIslandConquered)
      This method checks that the owners of the islands adjacent to the one in position "numIslandConquered" are equal and if they are, it joins them into a single island, and removes the other from the islands vector
      Parameters:
      numIslandConquered - number that identifies the islandId

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int numMoves)
      Method to move mother nature
      Parameters:
      numMoves - number of jumps of mother nature

    • setIslandsNoEntry

      public void setIslandsNoEntry(int numIsland)
      This method sets an island as NoEntry meaning Mother Nature can't move here
      Parameters:
      numIsland - The index of the island to set as NoEntry

    • resetIslandsNoEntry

      public void resetIslandsNoEntry(int numIsland)
      This method resets an island as NoEntry meaning Mother Nature can enter again
      Parameters:
      numIsland - The index of the island to reset
